this video is brought to you by critical dice and 1985 games who have partnered
to bring you the deck of stories on kickstarter
the deck of stories is a collection of unique and captivating story hooks meant
to be used in your favorite tabletop role-playing games
as some instant and easy inspiration for game masters
each card has a different game hook with questions to help you flesh out
details for your new adventure cards can even be combined to make a full epic
story arc whether you're planning a long campaign or just need a quick one-shot
idea for your next session the deck of stories is a great tool in
your game prep toolbox the kickstarter will include the first
two volumes five themed boosters and the genesis box npc boosters will
also be available these sets include pre-generated
characters that you can quickly insert into your story
each mpc features a collection of traits that can help you role play that
character the traits develop the npc but still keep their background vague enough
for them to fit into your own original world
the crafting gm has a lot of work on their plate and tools like this are
invaluable for getting dynamic and exciting
sessions planned and prepared for your group the kickstarter just launched and
i'll put a link in the video description so you can grab a set of these cards for
yourself thanks for sponsoring this video now

well i've played with this machine for a
